Location.Name: Malaysia
Location.Address: Microsoft Malaysia, Level 26, Menara 3 Petronas Persiaran KLCC, Kuala Lumpur City Centre 50088, Malaysia

Speaker.Name: Raymond Chou
Speaker.Description: Raymond Chou is the Regional Managing Principal Consultant for Redynamics Asia and Infront Consulting Group Asia Pacific, dynamic, future-driven companies that focuses on providing Systems Management and Virtualization consulting, implementation and training to companies mainly around the APAC region. He is a seasoned trainer and consultant and has been in the information technology industry for more than 10 years ever since the days of Windows 3.1. His focus is on the System Center product line and the team performs consulting and deployment exercises all over the region on Hyper-V, Operations Manager, Configuration Manager, Data Protection Manager, Virtual Machine Manager, Service Manager and App-V

Sessions.Title: Keynote - Veeam Cloud Connect for the Enterprise

Speaker.Name: Raymond Goh
Speaker.Description:
Raymond Goh is the Technical Director for the Asia & Japan region at Veeam Software and is based in Singapore. He has over 18 years of IT industry experience gleaned from around the region. His focus at Veeam is to help organisations get the most from their investment in the modern data centre, built on virtualisation and the cloud. Raymond educates the market on the benefits of virtualisation management solutions, delivering keynote presentations and, high-profile customer engagements across the region. He also ensures that Veeam provides world class technical service to customers, prospects and partners, leading a team of dedicated 
pre-sales consultants spread across the region. Raymond regularly contributes to the media around the Asia & Japan region and offers insight into topics ranging from the modern data centre, the cloud, big data, Internet of Things and data protection. Prior to joining Veeam, Raymond held roles with CA, DoubleTake Software and Vision Solutions. Raymond joined the IT industry after graduating with honours in Computational Science majoring in mathematical research programming from the National University of Singapore. In his spare time, he enjoys a good game of golf and basketball and spending quality time with his family.

Sessions.Title: A comparison of Public Cloud Vendors. Is Azure better?

Speaker.Name: Darien Nagle
Speaker.Description: Darien has over 30 years of IT experience including former positions at TIBCO and Microsoft. Darien has worked across Australia and Southeast Asia including as Specialist Director at Microsoft Malaysia. An accomplished Cloud Computing seller and recognized best-practices global speaker, Darien is a believer in a future of Platform-as-a-Service-based cloud applications. His expertise include establishing and embracing a customer's cloud journey and jointly developing a cloud technology roadmap incorporating some quick value-based wins up front. His current technologies and solutions expertise include Linux and Windows virtual machines in the cloud, SAP on Microsoft Azure, Sitecore and elastic websites, hybrid integration (EAI) in the cloud, elastic scale database and compute patterns (implemented for some of the largest customers in the world), test/dev and DevOps leveraging the cloud, networking considerations in globally distributed multi-clouds and hybrid environments.

Speaker.Name: Raymond Tan
Speaker.Description: He has total 15 years of experience in Microsoft enterprise solutions; former employee of Microsoft Malaysia, AirAsia and HP.  He is the regular speaker in various Microsoft and Dell partners’ event, provide consultancy and training on Azure, Office 365, and Power BI.  He also have an external role from Microsoft as Regional Director – helping Microsoft product teams to understand better in the market and customers' needs, while assisting these customers in leveraging Microsoft's technologies and services for their environments and solutions, and active contributor community member in Facebook Groups (Azure, Office 365, Elite, SMB partners).

Speaker.Name: Lai Yoong Seng
Speaker.Description: Lai is a Systems Engineer for Veeam Software. He has helped many customers traverse to Microsoft Hyper-V, System Center, Microsoft Azure and Veeam throughout his 15 years of working experience in the IT industry. Besides that, Lai is a 6 years MVP on Cloud & Datacenter Management, been Microsoft P-Seller on Private and Hybrid Cloud for 3 years, nominated as 1st in South East Asia (SEA) as Veeam Vanguard and also Technical Reviewer for five (5) books on Hyper-V for Packt Publishing. He also participates as Technology Early Adopter (TAP) and Tester of Windows Server Vnext and System Center Vnext for 5 years. As the founder of Malaysia Virtualization User Group (MVUG), he is actively involved in contributing Virtualization activities and contents in Malaysia. He also shares all his findings and experience on his blog (www.ms4u.info).

Speaker.Name: Darien Nagle
Speaker.Description: Darien has over 30 years of IT experience including former positions at TIBCO and Microsoft. Darien has worked across Australia and Southeast Asia including as Specialist Director at Microsoft Malaysia. An accomplished Cloud Computing seller and recognized best-practices global speaker, Darien is a believer in a future of Platform-as-a-Service-based cloud applications. His expertise include establishing and embracing a customer's cloud journey and jointly developing a cloud technology roadmap incorporating some quick value-based wins up front. His current technologies and solutions expertise include Linux and Windows virtual machines in the cloud, SAP on Microsoft Azure, Sitecore and elastic websites, hybrid integration (EAI) in the cloud, elastic scale database and compute patterns (implemented for some of the largest customers in the world), test/dev and DevOps leveraging the cloud, networking considerations in globally distributed multi-clouds and hybrid environments.

Speaker.Name: Ravishankar
Speaker.Description: Ravishankar is a Microsoft Cloud Architect, who worked with Microsoft's Datacenter Center of Excellence (CoE) team, working with Hosting Service Providers (HSP) worldwide. He has 10+ years experience in designing and deployinh Hybrid and Public Cloud technologies such as Hyper-V, System Center, Azure and Office 365.

Sessions.Title: Azure Resource Manager Templates - A Beginner Guide

Speaker.Name: Juv Chan
Speaker.Description: Juv Chan is a Senior Azure Developer for more than 2 years. He recently won the Microsoft Influencer Hero Asia Pacific 2015 - Developer category Grand Prize organized by Microsoft Asia Pacific, for his video contributions on Channel 9 on the areas of Azure & Big Data development as well as developer forums support related to Azure. He is also among the top 2% of contributors for Azure related tags on the StackOverflow forum.

Sessions.Title: Azure Mobile Engagement and Applications Insights

Speaker.Name: Chia Shaw Chyn
Speaker.Description: Microsoft Certified Trainer, Microsoft Most Valuable Professional, Windows Developer, Specialized on Windows Mobile platform development, and hobbies in Windows 10 IoT

Sessions.Title: Now Everyone Can Build a Bot with Bot Framework

Speaker.Name: Aswin C.
Speaker.Description: Aswin has been with Microsoft Malaysia for about 2 years now. He has been actively engaging with tech and startup communities such as hackathons, meetups and events. He's getting his hands dirty by coding, technical forums and blogging during his free time and has been working with startups and software house through Microsoft Bizspark program and Microsoft Partners program. Besides that, he is also leading Microsoft Student Partners Malaysia to build the next-gen developers and IT Professionals for Malaysia.

Sessions.Title: Application in Microsoft Azure has Fallen!

Speaker.Name: Walter Wong
Speaker.Description: Walter Wong is a technical lead in Gain Secure, a Malaysian-based company. The company specialized for providing secure application development and user experience (UX) consultation services to customers. Walter is a Microsoft MVP for developer security. Research on application development security is Walter's personal interest. He also successfully discovered many websites vulnerabilities including some high traffic websites over the past few years. Walter often speaks at technical conferences such as Visual Studio 2010 Launch, TechEd SEA, Security Symposium, TechNet/MSDN, Tech Insights and more.

Sessions.Title: Empowering your application with intelligence with Cognitive Services

Speaker.Name: Abdullah Abbas
Speaker.Description: Abdullah Abbas is the Windows Developers Malaysia community lead and also expert in Windows Platform Development. He is actively organizing community events, gave talks in various events and also a seasoned hackaton participant that already won multiple hackaton that focusing on Windows Development. He is currently Head of Technology Innovation in iProperty Group, the number 1 property portal in Asia. He is focusing on Machine Learning with Azure, and also data visualization with Microsoft technology.
